title: Get all Relationships: IMAGE belongs to NODE TYPE
user_story:
As an API consumer\
I want to know all nodes an IMAGE is connected to\
But the returned list should be grouped by NODE type\
So I get a semantic perspective on the data
description:
* the relationships are successfully retrieved when provided with valid data â†’ status code `200`
  * a JSON object, with an array for each node type, each containing the following relationship data:
    * `image_id`: integer
    * `partner_node_id`: integer
    * `partner_node_type`: string
    * `relationship_id`: integer
    * `relationship_name`: string
* the relationship retrieval fails when the provided data was not valid
  * status code `404` when the `image` was not found
* when there exist no relationships then the respective array in the object is empty

### **NOT in scope for this iteration**

* proper JSON structure according to the JSON:API
